--space-preset-1.description: Great for really small spaces such as connecting an error message to a form.

--space-preset-2.description: Great to connect related components, like a header and a description.

--space-preset-4.description: Great for inner padding, like left & right padding for content on mobile apps.

--space-preset-5.description: Great for left & right inner padding in sections.

--space-preset-8.description: Great for space between illustrations and headers.
